title: lagosnoir
author: lagosnoir
content: Description: HOPE (2014) 32 inches width by 36 inches height. Pyrography art (drawing with burn marks) by Hanson Okere. Realistic image of an African lady in a thoughtful pose. Hanson Okere is a rising star in the contemporary art scene. Weight: About 10kg. Front Image: https://www.imagebam.com/view/MEN6L6CBack Image: https://www.imagebam.com/view/MEN6H6YSignature: https://www.imagebam.com/view/MEN6H77Accepted payment method: Bitcoin Escrow Only.Starting bid:0.050 BTC with bid increments of 0.05 BTC.Buy it now: 0.0695 BTCEnd date and time: The end of August 31, 2023. 11.59 PM Midnight ( GMT)See countdown Link: https://www.tickcounter.com/countdown/4339202/art-trade-galleryÂ Shipping: Bid price includes worldwide courier to your country. Buyer responsible for own country taxes. Delivery will be by international shipping with tracking. DHL or similar company.After the auction ends, I will contact you for delivery information as well as name escrow chosen on bitcointalk. Do not hesitate to ask questions.arttrading.org

comments.author: iPaD
comments.body: I am Politely Dropping by to Say TheArt is Incredibly Great and I Love it.Very Real.
